mapper.select: SELECT d.user_sqno AS userSqno, d.title, d.content, d.tag1, d.tag2, d.tag3, d.emotion, d.diary_status AS diaryStatus, d.del_yn AS delYn, d.reg_dt AS date, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', d.user_id) AS userId, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', u.username) AS username, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', u.nickname) AS nickname, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', d.author) AS author FROM diary d LEFT JOIN users u ON d.user_sqno = u.user_sqno WHERE d.del_yn = 'N' AND (#{userId} IS NULL OR #{userId} = '' OR d.user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY d.reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT d.diary_id AS diaryId, d.user_sqno AS userSqno, d.title, d.content, d.tag1, d.tag2, d.tag3, d.emotion, d.diary_status AS diaryStatus, d.del_yn AS delYn, d.reg_dt AS date, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', d.user_id) AS userId, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', u.username) AS username, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', u.nickname) AS nickname, IF(u.delYn = 'Y', '탈퇴한 회원', d.author) AS author FROM diary d LEFT JOIN users u ON d.user_sqno = u.user_sqno WHERE d.diary_id = #{diaryId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND d.user_id = #{userId} AND (d.del_yn = 'N' OR d.del_yn IS NULL)
